about_the_game:
Boxman Adventures is a fun platformer game about a friendly box-headed creature. Complete various levels in various different environments, including forests, deserts, and several other unique locations.

During your journey, you will have to complete many platforming challenges while attempting to make it to the flag at the end of each level. Along with reaching the end flag, the player must also dodge obstacles and complete puzzles while maneuvering between platforms.

This game might not have the most detailed graphics because the intended style is supposed to try and recreate the style of old n64 games.

Upon release the game will come with seven different levels but there are plans to add more after launch.
